detailsSection: This PowerPoint deck contains overviews about business drivers, imperatives, and challenges that are relevant to the target BDMs, and contains an introduction to the available features/functionalities. This PowerPoint deck facilitates an introductory discussion with a BDM and to further discuss, summarize, and baseline solution attribute priorities in a second or third meeting. When used in conjunction with this PowerPoint deck, the BDM Conversation Sheet is a useful tool to discuss and capture business needs and solution priorities.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
